channel.title: File on Filecoin Spec
channel.description: Recent content in File on Filecoin Spec

item.title: FileStore - Local Storage for Files
item.description: The FileStore is an abstraction used to refer to any underlying system or device that Filecoin will store its data to. It is based on Unix filesystem semantics, and includes the notion of Paths. This abstraction is here in order to make sure Filecoin implementations make it easy for end-users to replace the underlying storage system with whatever suits their needs. The simplest version of FileStore is just the host operating system’s file system.
